ingredients: 2 cup(s) chopped, hulled fresh strawberries (about 8 oz.) plus 6 whole berries for garnish
Seeds scraped from 1/2 vanilla bean or 1 teaspoon vanilla bean paste
3/4 cup(s) Homemade Strawberry Conserve (if using store-bought, use 1/2 cup, stirred to loosen)
3 crisp ladyfingers (savoiardi, Boudoirs,or Champagne biscuits), crushed
